1.long: I listen, hearken to, obey, answer.
just; especially, just in the eyes of God; righteous; the elect (a Jewish idea).

2.brief: I value at a price, honor
2.long: (a) I value at a price, estimate, (b) I honor, reverence.

3.long: well, well done, good, rightly; also used as an exclamation.

3.brief: I come into being, am born
3.long: I come into being, am born, become, come about, happen.

3.brief: on, to, against, on the basis of, at
3.long: on, to, against, on the basis of, at.
the earth, soil, land, region, country, inhabitants of a region.

4.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
4.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
discipline; training and education of children, hence: instruction; chastisement, correction.

5.long: I listen, hearken to, obey, answer.

5.brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
5.long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.
flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.

(a) fear, terror, alarm, (b) the object or cause of fear, (c) reverence, respect.
lit: the heart; mind, character, inner self, will, intention, center.

5.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
5.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

6.brief: down from, against, according to, throughout, during
6.long: gen: against, down from, throughout, by; acc: over against, among, daily, day-by-day, each day, according to, by way of.

6.brief: service rendered only while the master watches
6.long: eye-service; service rendered only while the master watches.

6.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
6.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.
desirous of pleasing men, a renderer of service to human beings (as opposed to God).

(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
an act of will, will; plur: wishes, desires.

6.brief: from out, out from among, from
6.long: from out, out from among, from, suggesting from the interior outwards.
(a) the vital breath, breath of life, (b) the human soul, (c) the soul as the seat of affections and will, (d) the self, (e) a human person, an individual.

7.long: (a) gen: with, in company with, (b) acc: (1) behind, beyond, after, of place, (2) after, of time, with nouns, neut. of adjectives.

7.brief: I am a slave, am subject to, obey
7.long: I am a slave, am subject to, obey, am devoted.

7.brief: as, like as, how, while, so that
7.long: as, like as, about, as it were, according as, how, when, while, as soon as, so that.

7.brief: a man, one of the human race
7.long: a man, one of the human race.

8.long: that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
each (of more than two), every one.
any one, some one, a certain one or thing.
(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.
intrinsically good, good in nature, good whether it be seen to be so or not, the widest and most colorless of all words with this meaning.

(a) act: I convey, bring, carry, (b) mid: I receive back, receive what has belonged to myself but has been lost, or else promised but kept back, or: I get what has come to be my own by earning, recover.
gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

(a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause.

9.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
9.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

9.long: I send up, produce, send back; I let go; I relax, loosen, hence met: I give up, desist from.
that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.

9.brief: he, she, it, they, them, same
9.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.
heaven, (a) the visible heavens: the atmosphere, the sky, the starry heavens, (b) the spiritual heavens.
gen: from; dat: beside, in the presence of; acc: alongside of.

9.long: he, she, it, they, them, same.

dominion, strength, power; a mighty deed.

11.long: (a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can.

trans: (a) I make to stand, place, set up, establish, appoint; mid: I place myself, stand, (b) I set in balance, weigh; intrans: (c) I stand, stand by, stand still; met: I stand ready, stand firm, am steadfast.
(a way of search after something, an inquiry; a method), scheming, craftiness, deceit.
(adj. used often as a noun), slanderous; with the article: the Slanderer (par excellence), the Devil.

12.long: that, since, because; may introduce direct discourse.
wrestling, a wrestling bout; hence: a struggle, fight, conflict, contest.
flesh, body, human nature, materiality; kindred.
(a) rule (kingly or magisterial), (b) plur: in a quasi-personal sense, almost: rulers, magistrates, (c) beginning.
(a) power, authority, weight, especially: moral authority, influence, (b) in a quasi-personal sense, derived from later Judaism, of a spiritual power, and hence of an earthly power.
ruler of this world, that is, of the world as asserting its independence of God; used of the angelic or demonic powers controlling the sublunary world.
heavenly, celestial, in the heavenly sphere, the sphere of spiritual activities; met: divine, spiritual.

13.long: (a) gen: through, throughout, by the instrumentality of, (b) acc: through, on account of, by reason of, for the sake of, because of.
I take up, raise; I pick up, take on board; I carry off, lead away.
(a) I am powerful, have (the) power, (b) I am able, I can.

13.brief: I take a stand against, oppose, resist
13.long: I set against; I withstand, resist, oppose.
a day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
I effect by labor, achieve, work out, bring about.

trans: (a) I make to stand, place, set up, establish, appoint; mid: I place myself, stand, (b) I set in balance, weigh; intrans: (c) I stand, stand by, stand still; met: I stand ready, stand firm, am steadfast.

14.long: trans: (a) I make to stand, place, set up, establish, appoint; mid: I place myself, stand, (b) I set in balance, weigh; intrans: (c) I stand, stand by, stand still; met: I stand ready, stand firm, am steadfast.
I gird round; mid: I gird myself, generally for active work or travel.
truth, but not merely truth as spoken; truth of idea, reality, sincerity, truth in the moral sphere, divine truth revealed to man, straightforwardness.
(usually if not always in a Jewish atmosphere), justice, justness, righteousness, righteousness of which God is the source or author, but practically: a divine righteousness.

15.long: (lit: I bind under), mid: I put on my feet, pass: I am shod.
the good news of the coming of the Messiah, the gospel; the gen. after it expresses sometimes the giver (God), sometimes the subject (the Messiah, etc.), sometimes the human transmitter (an apostle).
peace, peace of mind; invocation of peace a common Jewish farewell, in the Hebraistic sense of the health (welfare) of an individual.

faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

16.long: pass: I burn, am set on fire, am inflamed; glow with heat, am purified by fire.

a mystery, secret, of which initiation is necessary; in the NT: the counsels of God, once hidden but now revealed in the Gospel or some fact thereof; the Christian revelation generally; particular truths or details of the Christian revelation.
the good news of the coming of the Messiah, the gospel; the gen. after it expresses sometimes the giver (God), sometimes the subject (the Messiah, etc.), sometimes the human transmitter (an apostle).

20.long: I am aged, act as an ambassador.

21.long: a weak adversative particle, generally placed second in its clause; but, on the other hand, and.

loved, beloved, with two special applications: the Beloved, a title of the Messiah (Christ), as beloved beyond all others by the God who sent Him; of Christians, as beloved by God, Christ, and one another.
a brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian.
a waiter, servant; then of any one who performs any service, an administrator.
